changelog:
Siberia OS v. 2.0
new:
- Ambient play with history and QS tile
- Privacy guard from LineageOS
- Navbar pixel animation
- Brightness slider OnePlus drawables
- Full navbar gestures from DU
- Navbar Pulse visualizer from DU
- Statusbar notification ticker
- Lockscreen charging animation
- Snap camera from LineageOS
- Partial screenshot come back
- Power-off alarm
- Launcher: double tap gestures, various fixes and improvements
- Stock recents rounded corners
- Turbo (Battery usage prediction)
- Update translations

fixed:
- Hiding SIM2 from statusbar issue
- Offline charging issue
- NFC issue

improvements:
- Battery usage prediction from Google health service
- GPS better accuracy and faster locking
- Xiaomi proprietary updated to MIUI 8.11.1 Global dev blobs
- Massive gemini device tree update

kernel:
- linux 3.18.125
- wlan driver updated to LA.UM.7.6.r1-03400-89xx.0 CAF tag
